      • setBeQuit

        public static void setBeQuit(Boolean beQuiet)

      • printHistoryAndReturnThrowable

        public static <T extends Throwable> T printHistoryAndReturnThrowable(T th,
                                                                     org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        th - exception stack to print.
        logger - the logger used as message printer.
        Returns:
        the related Throwable returned for further exception handling.

      • printHistoryAndReturnThrowable

        public static <T extends Throwable> T printHistoryAndReturnThrowable(T th,
                                                                     org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                                     LogLevel level)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The logging level is fixed to level "error".
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        th - exception stack to print.
        logger - the logger used as message printer.
        level - the logging level used for the print.
        Returns:
        the related Throwable returned for further exception handling.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        logger - the logger used as message printer.

        level - the logging level used for the print.

      • printHistory

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistory(String message,
                                                      T th,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                                      LogLevel level)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        message - the reason why this exception occurs.
        logger - the logger used as message printer.
        th - exception stack to print.
        level - the logging level used for the print.

      • printHistoryAndExit

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistoryAndExit(T th,
                                                             org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode and call system exit afterwards. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The logging level is fixed to level "error". After printing the system exit routine with error code 255 is triggered.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        th - exception stack to print.
        logger -

      • printHistory

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistory(String message,
                                                      T th,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The logging level is fixed to level "error". The given message and the exception are bundled as new CouldNotPerformException and further processed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        message - the reason why this exception occurs.
        th - exception cause.
        logger -

      • printHistoryAndExit

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistoryAndExit(String message,
                                                             T th,
                                                             org.slf4j.Logger logger)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode and call system exit afterwards. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The logging level is fixed to level "error". The given message and the exception are bundled as new CouldNotPerformException and further processed. After printing the system exit routine with error code 255 is triggered.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        message - the reason why this exception occurs.
        th - exception cause.
        logger -

      • printHistory

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistory(T th,
                                                      PrintStream stream)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        th - the exception stack to print.
        stream - the stream used for printing the message history e.g. System.out or. System.err

      • printHistoryAndExit

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistoryAndExit(T th,
                                                             PrintStream stream)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode and call system exit afterwards. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. After printing the system exit routine with error code 255 is triggered.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        th - the exception stack to print.
        stream - the stream used for printing the message history e.g. System.out or. System.err

      • printHistory

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistory(String message,
                                                      T th,
                                                      PrintStream stream)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The given message and the exception are bundled as new CouldNotPerformException and further processed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        message - the reason why this exception occurs.
        th - the exception cause.
        stream - the stream used for printing the message history e.g. System.out or. System.err

      • printHistoryAndExit

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistoryAndExit(String message,
                                                             T th,
                                                             PrintStream stream)
        Print Exception messages without stack trace in non debug mode and call system exit afterwards. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history. The given message and the exception are bundled as new CouldNotPerformException and further processed. After printing the system exit routine with error code 255 is triggered.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        message - the reason why this exception occurs.
        th - the exception cause.
        stream - the stream used for printing the message history e.g. System.out or. System.err

        Parameters:
        th - exception stack to print.
        stream - the stream used for printing the message history e.g. System.out or. System.err * @return the related Throwable returned for further exception handling.

      • printHistory

        public static <T extends Throwable> void printHistory(T th,
                                                      Printer printer)
        Prints a human readable Exception cause chain of the given Exception. Builds a human readable Exception Print Exception messages without StackTrace in non debug mode. Method prints recursive all messages of the given exception stack to get a history overview of the causes. In verbose mode (app -v) the stacktrace is printed in the end of history.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Exception type
        Parameters:
        printer - the message printer to use.
        th - exception stack to print.

      • getHistory

        public static String getHistory(Throwable th)
        Generates a human readable Exception cause chain of the given Exception as String representation.
        Parameters:
        th - the Throwable to process the StackTrace.
        Returns:
        A History description as String.
